column4: zosologist: 64bit is great for number crunching. I have a program that runs six times faster on a 2GHz Athlon64 than on a 3GHz Xeon.
i'm hoping to get cinelerra to compile on 64 bit one day to give it a shot
i tried it about 6 months ago
my system specs weren't very good then
do you do video editing at the moment?
I know it does with vdr's avis.
wmv doesn't work, but i can't watch them on amd64 anyway ;p
I'm sure that Openoffice works very well on my amd64 system (Paladine)
do you have any problems with the SaveAs dialogue?
no, but Xorg has a funny way of dealing with them...
your login shell will be bash, but /bin/sh will point to dash
